com.jde.model.physics

Class Movement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.model.physics.Movement

  • public class Movement
extends java.lang.Object
    This Movement class contains all the data about the position and direction of an entity
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int currentDir
      Index of the current direction of the list
      protected Direction direction
      Current direction of the entity
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Direction> directions
      A list with all the directions that the entity will follow
      protected double elapsed
      Elapsed time since entity started moving using the current direction
      protected boolean lookAtMovingDirection
      If enabled, the entity will rotate itself to face the direction is heading
      protected Vertex position
      Position of the entity
      protected double spin
      Self-rotation angle (in degrees)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Movement(Vertex position, java.util.ArrayList<Direction> directions)
      Basic constructor, which must provide a position and a list of directions
